about_the_game:
This is a trial version of 　1f y0u're a gh0st ca11 me here! 　The story is separate, and no data will be transferred to the full version
This demo version allows you to experience a part of the main character's story and a part of a new genre that can be called an action novel game
You will enjoy the experience of listening to the conversations of several people at the same time!

1f y0u're a gh0st ca11 me here! It's an adventure where you have to instantly judge the contents of multiple conversations that appear on the screen at the same time, and keep making the right choices to connect the combos.

This game is a novel game, but it is a new genre of game that can be called an action novel game.
More than three speech balloons appear on the screen at a time, and each one talks to the player at the same time. All of them are talking to the player!
The player must understand the meaning of the conversations that appear on the screen at the same time and make the right choice for each conversation.
It's like listening to multiple people talking at the same time, and doing so is like connecting a busy phone line to the right line.

The main character, Vanitas, is employed at a call center in the underworld and is tasked with guiding ghosts from the underworld to the underworld

You need to instantly understand what these ghosts are saying and connect them to the correct number
Overcome many things and become a first-class call master!
